message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me.  I'm confident it has the potential to be even more valuable to you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a significant opportunity for you to acquire something truly special. Let me know your thoughts.
